meanings.definition: The act of arriving or coming to a place.
meanings.sent1: The arrivals at the airport were greeted by their families.
meanings.sent2: The arrivals of new students at school happen every September.
meanings.sent3: The arrivals of the mischievous kittens brought chaos to the quiet house.
meanings.sent4: The arrivals of spring flowers painted the fields in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The arrivals of the circus performers made the town buzz with excitement.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that arrives or has arrived.
meanings.sent1: The arrivals included both tourists and locals.
meanings.sent2: The new arrivals in the neighborhood were warmly welcomed.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected arrival of the pizza delivery guy saved the party.
meanings.sent4: The arrival of the long-lost friend felt like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The grand arrival of the king was met with cheers and applause.
